ASOBO_GT_Update
ASOBO_GT_Visibility_Code
UseTemplate.VISIBILITY_CODE: 6 (>A:BUS LOOKUP INDEX, Number) (A:BUS CONNECTION ON:7, Bool) (A:CIRCUIT GENERAL PANEL ON:1, Bool) *

ASOBO_GT_Update
UseTemplate.UPDATE_CODE: #DEFAULT_VALUE# 0 (A:LIGHT PANEL:1, Bool) ? 1 (>K:2:PANEL_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET) 0 0 (A:LIGHT PANEL:2, Bool) ? 2 (>K:2:PANEL_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET) #DEFAULT_VALUE# 0 (A:LIGHT PANEL:3, Bool) ? 3 (>K:2:PANEL_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET) 0 0 (A:LIGHT PANEL:4, Bool) ? 4 (>K:2:PANEL_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET) 0 0 (A:LIGHT PANEL:5, Bool) ? 5 (>K:2:PANEL_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET)

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Update
UseTemplate.UPDATE_CODE: #DEFAULT_VALUE# 0 (A:LIGHT GLARESHIELD:1, Bool) ? 1 (>K:2:GLARESHIELD_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET) (* Lateral lights should always be off by default*) 0 2 (>K:2:GLARESHIELD_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET) 0 3 (>K:2:GLARESHIELD_LIGHTS_POWER_SETTING_SET)
